# Government Tender Announcement: Fire Alarm Monitoring and Equipment Upgrade
### Alberta, Canada
### Notice of a Request for Proposal (RFP) from the Royal Canadian Mounted Police

**Solicitation Number and Amendment**
M5000-22-01878/A Amendment 4

**Notice Date and Closing Date**
Publication Date: 2023-12-21
Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-15T15:00:00

**Business Opportunity**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police is seeking a service provider to supply and deliver Fire Alarm Monitoring Services and Fire Alarm Panel Inspection and Upgrade Services for multiple locations in Alberta.

**Contract Period**
Two years from the date of contract with an irrevocable option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods.

**Security Requirement**
The solicitation contains a security requirement.

**Selection Criteria**
The contract will be awarded to the responsive bidder with the lowest evaluated price. The mandatory technical evaluation criteria will be used to evaluate bids.

**Procurement Strategy**
This procurement has been conditionally set aside for Indigenous Businesses under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses (PSIB). Suppliers must certify that they qualify as an Indigenous business and will comply with all requirements of the PSIB.

**Method of Procurement**
Competitive bidding. The Government of Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

**Government of Canada’s Integrity Regime**
The Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada will be applied in this procurement.

**Required Documents**
The following documents are required:

* Solicitation documents (RFP)
* Mandatory Technical Criteria
* Indigenous Participation form (if applicable)

**Additional Information**
* Supplier must have a profile in the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) to increase visibility and compete for Indigenous business set-aside contracts.
* Contact information: Shawn Balaski (shawn.m.balaski@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)

(Attachments: RFP documents, Fire Alarm Panel Inspection and Upgrade Services, Indigenous Participation form)
